Text: Yo! Nobody's commenting on what quality this version is? Is it the real Perfect Stranger movie or? It's been downloaded 37 times already and nobody took the time to post something on the quality and originality of the flick...
...and you didn't take the time to read the little word CAM in the torrent name, eh...?

so...how *is* the quality, anyone?  i'm downloading, but just curious if it's a load of bollocks, stellar, or something middling inbetween...
peace,
j
Quality is pretty ok, not perfect. It's in the so called KVCD format, for wich you need the VLC player. Sound quality is kinda lowbit...
